TopicTitle: Video Tutorial: How to land on the Mun

Articles.Content:
http://youtu.be/471MMbJdER4?hd=1

Hi. I was attempting to tell a friend how to land on the Mun without bamboozling him with astrophysics terminology, so I created a tutorial video on how to land on the Mun. Apologies for the poor audio, I plan to redo this tutorial in the future, perhaps as part of a proper series of tutorials.

Tell me what you think of the tutorial itself, and what I should do the next time around (again, I am aware I need to fix the audio).

http://youtu.be/471MMbJdER4?hd=1

Hi. I was attempting to tell a friend how to land on the Mun without bamboozling him with astrophysics terminology, so I created a tutorial video on how to land on the Mun. Apologies for the poor audio, I plan to redo this tutorial in the future, perhaps as part of a proper series of tutorials.

Darn you! I just made a 40 minute guide on how to get to the Mun. haha. It\'s ok. I\'ll post it, too.
I love the ending. In the mean time ill figure out some way to get back to earth. lol
I have yet to figure out how to get back to Kerbin reliably.

I have yet to figure out how to get back to Kerbin reliably.

Easy as cake. Launch to the EAST. (Orbiting West to East) at 100KM. Burn when the Kerbin rises over the horizon.
